text: Kanash (; , Kana≈ü, lit. soviet) is a town in the Chuvash Republic, Russia. It has a big railway junction. It is from Cheboksary, the capital of the republic. Population: ==History== It was founded in 1891. From 1891 to 1925 it was named Shikhrany (). Kanash grew in the late 19th century because of the construction of a railroad in the town. Kanash became a town in 1925. At the time, its population was around 2,200. ==References== ===Notes=== ===Sources=== * * ==Other websites== *Official website of Kanash *Kanash Business Directory Category:Cities and towns in Chuvashia Category:1891 establishments in Europe
title: Kanash
